name: Caldereta
description: A rich and savory Filipino beef stew slow-cooked in tomato sauce with tender potatoes and carrots. This hearty dish features a thick, flavorful sauce that's perfect for a satisfying meal.

name: Adobo
description: The iconic Filipino dish featuring tender pork braised in a tangy blend of soy sauce and vinegar with garlic. A classic comfort food that's loved by generations.

name: Chicken Teriyaki
description: Juicy grilled chicken glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce. This Japanese-inspired favorite combines tender meat with a perfectly balanced sauce that's both rich and satisfying.

name: Tonkatsu
description: Crispy Japanese-style breaded pork cutlet fried to golden perfection. Each bite delivers a satisfying crunch on the outside while staying tender and juicy on the inside. Served with tangy tonkatsu sauce.
